name: @cherryhoax/discouicapacitor
description: well its disco ui. in android
author: cherryhoax

scripts.verify: npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean build test && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run docgen && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs
scripts.build:android: npm run build && cd example-app && npm ci && npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.install:android: npm run build:android && adb wait-for-device && adb install -r example-app/android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk
scripts.dev:link: test -d ../DiscoUI && (cd ../DiscoUI && npm link && npm run build) && npm link discoui && npm run build && echo '✓ Linked to local DiscoUI' || echo '✗ DiscoUI not found at ../DiscoUI'
scripts.dev:unlink: npm unlink discoui && npm install && echo '✓ Unlinked from local DiscoUI'
scripts.dev: npm run dev:link && npm run watch
scripts.postinstall: test -d ../DiscoUI && test "$NODE_ENV" != "production" && npm run dev:link --silent || true
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && git push && git push --tags
